---
title: "Summary of 2020 Data"
output: html_notebook
---

A bit of summary of the 2020 data for the annual report.

# Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

# Load Data


```{r}

rich <- obs %>% 
  left_join(stations, by = "StationID") %>% 
  filter(Year == "2020") %>% 
  group_by(StationID, Visit) %>% 
  summarise(rich = n_distinct(SpCode))

summary(rich$rich)

```
